name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE!!!】3D新衣装お披露目!! ゲストと歌って踊って生誕祭♪♪♪【hololive⧸宝鐘マリン】 [wF_VmniNI2I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: MC section: Houshou Marine celebrates her birthday, talks about her new 3D costume, and receives a surprise message and gift from the mascot Hokkori Mokomoka.
Houshou Marine and Aki Rosenthal perform the song 'Ankoku Tengoku'.

subtitles.original: 出航！！
subtitles.english: Set sail!!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、まず2曲聴いていただきました。
subtitles.english: All right! So we just heard the first two songs.

subtitles.original: はい、本日は何の日？そう、宝鐘マリンお誕生日です！
subtitles.english: Yes! What day is it today? That's right! It's Houshou Marine's birthday!

subtitles.original: はい、今日のハッシュタグは #宝鐘マリン生誕祭2022 まなんですけど、
subtitles.english: Yes! Today's hashtag is #HoushouMarineBirthdayFest2022, but...

subtitles.original: ま、今日はね、何といっても、ま、ここに書いてある通り、え、3Dのね、新衣装のお披露目もあります！
subtitles.english: well, today, more than anything, as written here, we also have the 3D new costume reveal!

subtitles.original: もうこれはね、隠しておくのは無理なんで先に言っちゃいます。でもう隠してることもひとつあるのよな。
subtitles.english: It's impossible to keep it hidden anymore, so I'm just saying it now. And there's one more thing I'm hiding...

subtitles.original: ちょっと隠してることも、え、終盤にね、お披露目したいと思いますので最後までしっかり見てください。
subtitles.english: I'll reveal that hidden thing at the end, so please watch until the very end.

subtitles.original: どんな衣装だと思う？超エッチです。毎回エッチです。
subtitles.english: What kind of costume do you think it is? It's super sexy. It's always sexy.

subtitles.original: てなわけで何かね、今日はね、メッセージを何か頂いているというのを聞いているんですが、
subtitles.english: So, I've heard that I've received some kind of message today...

subtitles.original: なんかおやおや？あ！なんとね、あの、あの、あの…知ってますか君たち？あの…
subtitles.english: Something's up? Oh! Surprisingly, that, that, that... do you guys know? That...

subtitles.original: ほっこりモコモカちゃんからメッセージ頂いてるみたいです。知ってるよね？今日中、知らないなんてことはないよね？モグリだよそれは。
subtitles.english: It seems I've received a message from Hokkori Mokomoka-chan. You know them, right? Everyone here, you couldn't possibly not know them, right? You'd be an outsider if you didn't.

subtitles.original: あのね、すごく可愛いクマです。見ればわかる。ということで、じゃあメッセージお願いします！
subtitles.english: They're a very cute bear. You'll see. So, please, the message!

subtitles.original: マリン船長へ
subtitles.english: To Captain Marine

subtitles.original: デカ！なんだこのお幸せな世界。
subtitles.english: Huge! What is this happy world?

subtitles.original: こんにちは〜！ほっこりモコモカだよ〜
subtitles.english: Hello! I'm Hokkori Mokomoka~

subtitles.original: きょうは　だいすきな　マリンせんちょうの　たんじょうび！
subtitles.english: Today is my beloved Captain Marine's birthday!

subtitles.original: わ〜い！すごい！頭に乗ってるやつちっちゃ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Amazing! The one on its head is tiny!

subtitles.original: モカもお祝いにきたよ〜！
subtitles.english: Moka came to celebrate too~!

subtitles.original: わ〜い！お喜びで可愛い！可愛い可愛い、なんか可愛いのがちっちゃ映るやつ…
subtitles.english: Yay! It's so happy and cute! Cute, cute, something cute is showing up in that small window...

subtitles.original: モカがかざりつけをしたんだ〜
subtitles.english: Moka did the decorations!

subtitles.original: ああ可愛い！ああすごい！え、凄くない？え、凄い！
subtitles.english: Ah, cute! Ah, amazing! Eh, isn't this amazing? Eh, amazing!

subtitles.original: いちみのみんな〜！
subtitles.english: Everyone in the Ichimi!

subtitles.original: いつもがんばっている　マリンせんちょうに　モコモカパワーをいっしょにおくろう！
subtitles.english: Let's send the Mokomoka Power together to Captain Marine, who's always working hard!

subtitles.original: じゅんびはいいかな？せーのっ　モコモカパワー！
subtitles.english: Are you ready? One, two... Mokomoka Power!

subtitles.original: 可愛い！ブラブラしてる、ブラブラしてる可愛い！
subtitles.english: Cute! It's wobbling, wobbling, so cute!

subtitles.original: マリンせんちょうの　もとにすてきな　おくりものをしたよ
subtitles.english: I've sent a wonderful gift to Captain Marine.

subtitles.original: ああ頭のとんがりコーンが落ちそう。
subtitles.english: Ah, the pointy cone on its head is about to fall off.

subtitles.original: あのひ　モカとであってくれて　ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for meeting Moka that day.

subtitles.original: これからもモカは　マリンせんちょうのそばにいるよ〜　まったね〜
subtitles.english: From now on, Moka will always be by Captain Marine's side. See you later!

subtitles.original: 贈り物。ありがとうモコモカちゃん。可愛すぎ、可愛すぎ、可愛すぎる！
subtitles.english: A gift. Thank you Mokomoka-chan. Too cute, too cute, way too cute!

subtitles.original: うわ〜可愛い！船長も今初めて見たんですけど、可愛すぎる！え、有罪マジで可愛すぎる。
subtitles.english: Whoa, cute! I'm seeing it for the first time too, and it's too cute! It's a crime, seriously too cute.

subtitles.original: じゃちょっと贈り物が来ているってことなんですけど…見て…見て…見て…行くよ〜！じゃ、じゃ、じゃ…これ君たち見える？見えないか。
subtitles.english: So, a gift has arrived... let's see... let's see... let's see... Here we go! Now, now, now... can you guys see this? Maybe not.

subtitles.original: 今船長の元に…わ〜可愛い！ほら帽子被っちゃって！あらあらあら！可愛いわ！ありがとう！ありがとうモカちゃん！可愛いモカちゃん！可愛いわ！
subtitles.english: Right now, here with me... whoa, cute! Look, it's wearing the hat! Oh my, oh my! So cute! Thank you! Thank you Moka-chan! Cute Moka-chan! So cute!

subtitles.original: 暗黒天国 / 作詞：宝野アリカ / 作曲・編曲：片倉三起也
subtitles.english: Ankoku Tengoku / Lyrics: Arika Takano / Composition & Arrangement: Mikiya Katakura

subtitles.original: Darling 目を開けて
subtitles.english: Darling, open your eyes

subtitles.original: この世の悪の巣窟で
subtitles.english: In this world's nest of evil

subtitles.original: 吸い玉守る　心を頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me your beautiful heart

subtitles.original: 逃げもできない
subtitles.english: You can't even escape

subtitles.original: 幽閉の蒼白の王子よ
subtitles.english: The pale prince of confinement

subtitles.original: わたしが女神
subtitles.english: I am the goddess

subtitles.original: バタフライの羽も
subtitles.english: Even the butterfly's wings

subtitles.original: わたしの抱擁も
subtitles.english: And my embrace too

subtitles.original: あなたをまだ見ぬ　極楽へ連れ出せはしない
subtitles.english: Won't bring you to the unseen paradise

subtitles.original: 腐りかけた自由
subtitles.english: Decaying freedom

subtitles.original: 紅にまみれた夢
subtitles.english: Red-stained dreams

subtitles.original: 煉獄の炎で　灼かれたら
subtitles.english: If taken to the purgatory flames

subtitles.original: 再生しめしょう
subtitles.english: Let me show you rebirth

subtitles.original: 冬の夜の空に
subtitles.english: In the night sky

subtitles.original: 色濃い彩
subtitles.english: Darkly colored

subtitles.original: 落ちてゆくなら
subtitles.english: Falling together

subtitles.original: 足掻けあり地獄
subtitles.english: Struggle and resist

subtitles.original: Darling 声上げて
subtitles.english: Darling, raise your voice

subtitles.original: このいま刺し違えるほど
subtitles.english: To the point of stabbing each other

subtitles.original: 大事なものが欲しいのなら
subtitles.english: If you want something precious

subtitles.original: 痛みは果てて
subtitles.english: Pain will end

subtitles.original: 奈落で昇天の姫君
subtitles.english: In the netherworld, the ascending princess

subtitles.original: あなたは…
subtitles.english: You are...

subtitles.original: 怒りの拳も
subtitles.english: Even the fist of anger

subtitles.original: 嘆きの傷も
subtitles.english: Even the wounds of grief

subtitles.original: 跡形もなく
subtitles.english: Without a trace

subtitles.original: 熔けて消えて散って泡沫
subtitles.english: Melting, disappearing, scattering like bubbles

subtitles.original: すべては密やかに蒼く
subtitles.english: Everything turns deeply blue

subtitles.original: 埋もれた罠に
subtitles.english: Buried in traps
